article.title: Measuring night sky brightness: methods and challenges

multiple_choice_question.text: What device is shown in Figure 1?
What information is represented by the blue curves in Figure 2?
choices: The spectral response of various light measuring devices.
The atmospheric transmission at different wavelengths.
The spectral power distribution of common light sources.
The color sensitivity of the human eye under different light conditions.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the bright band across the sky in Figure 5 represent?
choices: Light pollution from a nearby city.

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Table 4, which device offers the most cost-effective way to measure sky brightness in magV/arcsec2 ?
